category-description: Enhances readability and accessibility by allowing customization of text spacing to accommodate user needs.

token-sets.token-set-description: Provides tokens to adjust line height, letter spacing, word spacing, and paragraph spacing to ensure text remains readable when spacing is increased up to the levels specified in WCAG 1.4.12.
token-sets.user-benefit: Allows users with visual impairments or cognitive disabilities to adjust text spacing to improve readability and comprehension.

tokens.instructions: Apply as minimum line height to text content.
Apply as letter spacing to all text elements.
Apply as word spacing to enhance readability.
Use to set spacing between paragraphs to avoid visual crowding.

category-description: Ensures that color is not used as the sole method for conveying critical information, to accommodate users who cannot perceive color differences.

token-sets.token-set-description: Provides design tokens that ensure text and interactive elements can be understood without relying solely on color, thereby meeting WCAG 1.4.1 requirements.
token-sets.user-benefit: Helps users who have color vision deficiencies to access and understand content without ambiguity.

tokens.instructions: Apply non-color indicators such as underlines to links or other interactive elements.
Incorporate icons or text labels to supplement color cues for actions or statuses.

category-description: Ensures that text and images of text maintain a minimum contrast ratio, making content accessible to users with visual impairments.

token-sets.token-set-description: Provides design tokens that specify color combinations for text and backgrounds that meet or exceed the minimum contrast ratio requirements of WCAG 1.4.3.
token-sets.user-benefit: Facilitates readability for users with low vision and those who struggle with text under less than ideal conditions.

tokens.instructions: Apply this contrast ratio between text and its background for normal text.
Apply this contrast ratio for large-scale text and images of large-scale text.

token-sets.token-set-description: These design tokens define color combinations for text and backgrounds that exceed the minimum requirements, meeting the enhanced contrast ratios specified in WCAG 1.4.6.
token-sets.user-benefit: Ensures that text is easily readable without strain in a variety of settings and for users with more significant vision impairments.

tokens.instructions: Apply this contrast ratio between text and its background for normal text.
Apply this contrast ratio for large-scale text and images of large-scale text.
